N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 622.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Principles of compliance. (1)

The provisions of this Part shall apply and take effect as prescribed in
article 8 of the Environmental Conservation Law. (2)

This Part applies to all actions
undertaken by the OPWDD or which require approval by the OPWDD, including all
actions on the grounds of facilities identified in Article 13.17 of the Mental

Hygiene Law. (3)

This Part does not
apply to actions by private persons where only ministerial action (see
glossary) is involved. The lists of actions identified in section
622.4
are intended to cover only
actions of the OPWDD or actions which must be approved, funded or otherwise
acted upon by the OPWDD. (4)

This

Part shall take effect on November 1, 1989. (b) Standards of
certification. [
Reserved
]. Notes
